Class TotpAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.security.totp.TotpAuthenticator

  • public class TotpAuthenticator
extends Object
    Provides TOTP functions (wrapping a third-party TOTP implementation).

      • checkCode

        public boolean checkCode(String totpKey,
                         String inputCode)
        Returns whether the given input code matches for the provided TOTP key.
        Parameters:
        totpKey - the key to check with
        inputCode - the input code to verify
        Returns:
        true if code is valid, false otherwise
